text: John Mackey (born October 1, 1973) is an American composer. He writes for wind ensemble most of the time. He used to write for dance companies. He studied at Cleveland Institute of Music first and then Juillard. Mackey currently lives in San Francisco, California. == References == Category:1973 births Category:20th-century American composers Category:21st-century American composers Category:Living people Category:People from Cambridge, Massachusetts Category:People from Ohio
title: John Mackey
